action.name: Load
action.param: "<?xml version=""1.0"" ?> <teams> <team quantity=""5""> <resistance>3</resistance> <spy>2</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">2</mission> <mission number=""2"">3</mission> <mission number=""3"">2</mission> <mission number=""4"">3</mission> <mission number=""5"">3</mission> </missions> </team> <team quantity=""6""> <resistance>4</resistance> <spy>2</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">2</mission> <mission number=""2"">3</mission> <mission number=""3"">4</mission> <mission number=""4"">3</mission> <mission number=""5"">4</mission> </missions> </team> <team quantity=""7""> <resistance>4</resistance> <spy>3</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">2</mission> <mission number=""2"">3</mission> <mission number=""3"">3</mission> <mission number=""4"">4</mission> <mission number=""5"">4</mission> </missions> </team> <team quantity=""8""> <resistance>5</resistance> <spy>3</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">3</mission> <mission number=""2"">4</mission> <mission number=""3"">4</mission> <mission number=""4"">5</mission> <mission number=""5"">5</mission> </missions> </team> <team quantity=""9""> <resistance>6</resistance> <spy>3</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">3</mission> <mission number=""2"">4</mission> <mission number=""3"">4</mission> <mission number=""4"">5</mission> <mission number=""5"">5</mission> </missions> </team> <team quantity=""10""> <resistance>6</resistance> <spy>4</spy> <missions> <mission number=""1"">3</mission> <mission number=""2"">4</mission> <mission number=""3"">4</mission> <mission number=""4"">5</mission> <mission number=""5"">5</mission> </missions> </team> </teams>"
